LoginForm.error: Dzina ḽa mushumisi kana phasiwede a zwo khakhea
LoginForm.heading: Ri khou dovha ra ni ṱanganedza!
LoginForm.instruction: Ro takala uri no vhuya! Dzhenani uri uri ni bvele phanḓa he na litsha hone.
LoginForm.login: Dzina ḽa mushumisi kana ḓiresi ya imeiḽi

RegisterForm.betaListSignUp: Ndi tama u thusa u linga phurojeke ntswa na u rumelwa imeiḽi musi dzi hone (u sa ḓikhethela)
RegisterForm.emailConfirm: Khwaṱhisedzani ḓiresi ya imeiḽi (Zwi a ṱoḓea)
RegisterForm.emailConfirmError: Ḓiresi dza imeiḽi a dzi fani, lingedzani hafhu.
RegisterForm.emailConflict: Akhaunthu ine ya vha na ḓiresi iyi yo no vha hone
RegisterForm.emailListSignUp: Ndi zwavhuḓi u nthumela imeiḽi tshifhinga tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe (zwi sa ṱoḓei)
RegisterForm.heading: Ri khou ni ṱanganedza!
RegisterForm.instruction: Kha vha ite akhaunthu u itela u thoma u ita ṱhoḓisiso ya vhukuma.
RegisterForm.passwordConfirmError: Phasiwede a dzi fani, lingedzani hafhu.
RegisterForm.privacyAgreement: U tendelana na mbekanyamaitele yashu ya tshiphiri (zwi a ṱoḓea)
RegisterForm.privacyAgreementError: U tendelana na mbekanyamaitele ya tshiphiri zwi a ṱoḓea.
RegisterForm.realNameHelp: Ri ḓo shumisa hezwi u ni ṋea tshikolodo kha mabammbiri a saintsi, phosiṱara, na zwiṅwe-vho.
RegisterForm.realNamePatternHelp: Kha vha ṅwale dzina, hu si ḓiresi ya imeiḽi
RegisterForm.underageConsent: Ndi khwaṱhisedza uri ndi mubebi/muṱhogomeli nahone ndi ṋea thendelo ya uri ṅwana wanga a ḓiṅwalise nga u ṋetshedza ḓiresi yanga ya imeiḽi sa ḓiresi khulwane ya vhukwamani. Nṋe na ṅwananga ri a pfesesa na u tendelana na mbekanyamaitele ya tshiphiri (i a ṱoḓea)
RegisterForm.underageEmail: Ḓiresi ya imeiḽi ya Mubebi/Muṱhogomeli (I a ṱoḓea)
RegisterForm.underageEmailSignUp: Arali na tenda, ri ḓo rumela imeiḽi tshifhinga tshoṱhe ri tshi ṱuṱuwedza phurojeke ntswa dzi tshimbidzanaho na ṱhoḓisiso kana maṅwe mafhungo a tshimbidzanaho na ṱhoḓisiso yashu. A ri nga shumisi zwidodombedzwa zwaṋu zwa vhukwamani u itela ndivho dza zwa vhubindudzi. (khetho)
RegisterForm.underageNotRealName: Ni ḓo shumisa dzina iḽi u dzhena. Ḽi ḓo sumbedzwa khagala. Ni songo shumisa dzina ḽaṋu ḽa vhukuma.
RegisterForm.underageWithParent: Arali ni fhasi ha miṅwaha ya 16, swayani bogisi iḽi u khwathisedza uri no ḓadza fomo na mubebi kana muṱhogomeli waṋu
RegisterForm.usernameConflict: Dzina ḽeneḽo ḽa mushumisi ḽo dzhiiwa
RegisterForm.usernameHelp: Hezwi zwi ḓo sumbedzwa khagala kha bodo dza milaedza, na zwiṅwe-vho.
RegisterForm.usernamePatternHelp: Madzina a vhashumisi a nga vha na maḽeḓere, nomboro, '.','-', na '_' fhedzi.

AuthModal.title: Kha vha dzhene kana vha ite akhaunthu ntswa.

FavouritesButton.add: Engedza kha zwine vha zwi funesa
FavouritesButton.remove: Zwo engedzwa kha zwine vha zwi funesa

newsLabels.dailyZooniverse: Zooniverse ya Ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe
